about_the_game:
This lightweight and compact software is designed for internal company meetings where screen sharing is needed over a local network. It is easy to use: simply specify the port, set a room password, and click start. This will launch a local screen sharing service and provide a URL link that other participants can use to view the shared screen via a web browser.

Currently, the software only supports screen sharing and does not include audio sharing. It is an ideal solution for companies with internal network-based meetings, particularly those facing connectivity issues between internal and external networks.
